statements: DELETE FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE user_id = 101 AND location_name = 'Home';
DELETE FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE behavior_event = 'check-in' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE user_id = 1 AND location_name = 'Home';
DELETE FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND behavior_event = 'Arrival';
DELETE FROM location_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'running' AND location_id = 10;
DELETE FROM location_behavior WHERE user_id = 123 AND location_id = 456;
DELETE FROM UserLocationBehavior WHERE user_id = 1001 AND time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND timestamp > '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM SecurityLogs WHERE security_alert = 'Unauthorized access detected';
